attributes.action: Allow GCSE's and A-Levels to go ahead
attributes.additional_details: To give students who want to do well and do their best the perfect opportunity to! Our exams are our last resort. Our last chance at secondary to show what we've got. To show how hard we have all worked over the last 5 years. And to help build our futures.
attributes.background: Our exams are possibly the most  important part of our school lives and it has just been ripped away from us. All these years of studying and practice papers for what? Our education is important to us. Our exams are important to us. Our futures are important to us. Our LIVES are important to us!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Don’t cancel GCSES and A-Levels in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554219

Give students the option to take exams or receive assessed grades for 2020/21: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559964

Offer GCSE and A level students the option to sit their exams at a later date: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567743
